Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Homeland Security is trying to force tech companies to hand over data about Trump critics
articles.description: The use of administrative subpoenas, which are not subject to judicial oversight, are used to demand a wealth of information from tech companies, including the owners of anonymous online accounts documenting ICE operations.
articles.summary: The use of administrative subpoenas, which are not subject to judicial oversight, are used to demand a wealth of information from tech companies, including the owners of anonymous online accounts documenting ICE operations
points: Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Skyryse lands another $300M to make flying, even helicopters, simple and safe
articles.description: Skyrsye, now valued at $1.15 billion, is pushing to get FAA certification for its universal operating system for flight.
articles.summary: Amazon-backed Skyrse seeks additional funding and aims for Federal Aviation Administration approval of their universal flying vehicle technology.
points: Skyrse is developing the first all-electric vertical takeoff helicopter, capable of carrying up to five passengers without any pilot training
The company's Skyryce operating system can autonomously navigate through traffic and avoid collisions using AI technology.
$300 million investment round led by Amazon invested in the project which is valued at $1.15 billion
articles.insight: The development of a universal flying vehicle could revolutionize transportation, making it simpler and safer for people to travel short distances without relying on conventional modes of transport.

articles.title: Agentic coding comes to Apple’s Xcode with agents from Anthropic and OpenAI
articles.description: Xcode 26.3 offers agentic coding capabilities with Anthropic's Claude Agent and OpenAI's Codex.
articles.summary: Apple has released Xcode version 26.3 featuring AI-driven code generation through agents from Anthropic (Claude) and OpenAI (Codex). This represents a significant shift towards integrating generative AI into software development tools.
points: Xcode now includes agentic coding features using Anthropic's Claude Agent integrated with Apple's SiriKit framework, allowing for voice-controlled code generation within Swift and Objective-C projects.

OpenAI has developed Codex which is being incorporated into Xcode to assist developers in writing customized scripts that can adapt across different languages targeted at macOS applications development.
articles.insight: The integration of AI agents like Claude and Codex within developer tools signifies a major evolution towards more intelligent, user-friendly coding environments. This could democratize software creation by lowering the barrier to entry for non-technical users while also offering sophisticated assistance for seasoned developers.

articles.title: Gradient’s heat pumps get new smarts to enable old-building retrofits
articles.description: Gradient's heat pumps fit in windows, minimizing installation times. Now, it is introducing software to make those units more intelligent.
articles.summary: Gradiant has launched new smart software for its window-fit heat pumps that facilitates retrofitting into existing buildings and reduces installation times.
points: Gradient' end to end solution integrates hardware with advanced software, allowing easy integration within old structures.
The innovative design of Gradient’s heat pump ensures minimal disruption during the fitting process in older homes or commercial buildings.
Intelligent retrofitting promises energy savings and improved efficiency for existing properties.
articles.insight: This development could significantly lower barriers to green upgrades in legacy infrastructure, promoting wider adoption of environmentally friendly technologies within the industry.

articles.title: Watch Club is producing short video dramas and building a social network around them
articles.description: Watch Club will house microdramas and fan discussions in the same app, creating a fandom-focused social media experience.
articles.summary: Watch Club is developing short video dramas with built-in spaces for audience interaction and discussions within the same app.
points: The Watch Club platform will combine entertainment with community engagement by hosting microdramas alongside interactive features like polls, comments, and fan art contributions.
A dedicated livechat feature enables real-time conversations among users, fostering a sense of belonging to an exclusive fandom circle within the app's social network.
The integration of these elements is designed to enhance user experience by making interactions seamless without requiring additional apps or platforms.
articles.insight: This approach represents how modern media consumption, particularly in IT/technology industries, increasingly blurs the line between entertainment and social interaction. The platform could set a precedent for future applications that combine content with community engagement features to create more immersive user experiences.

articles.title: Lotus Health nabs $35M for AI doctor that sees patients for free
articles.description: This AI doctor is licensed in all 50 states, the startup says. The deal was led by CRV and Kleiner Perkins.
articles.summary: Lotus Health has raised $35 million to develop an AI doctor that offers free medical consultations across all 50 states.
points: AI-powered digital health startup Lotus Health secures a multi-million dollar funding round led by CRV and Kleiner Perkins.
The virtual physician, which is said to be capable of seeing patients for free in any state with an internet connection, will serve as the first autonomous 'primary care provider'.
Lotus Health' extramural AI chatbot aims to improve accessibility and alleviate healthcare costs.
articles.insight: This significant investment into Lotus Health could lead to wider adoption of virtual doctors, potentially reducing the strain on traditional primary care systems while providing an affordable alternative for patients seeking medical advice.

articles.title: French police search X office in Paris, summon Elon Musk for questioning
articles.description: The Paris prosecutor’s office announced that it is expanding a criminal investigation into X for alleged crimes, including the possession and distribution of child sexual exploitation material.
articles.summary: In France, police are investigating Alphabet Inc.' end-user services platform's (X) role in alleged crimes related to the possession and distribution of child sexual exploitation material.
points: Paris prosecutor’s office expands criminal investigation into X for potential involvement in serious crimes, including CSEM
Elon Musk summoned by French authorities; his responses could impact legal proceedings and public perception of tech firms' responsibility regarding content regulation.
The case emphasizes the complex relationship between platform governance policies and law enforcement expectations for preventing abuse.
articles.insight: This investigation highlights growing scrutiny over technology companies’ ability to monitor, control, or self-regulate illegal activities on their platforms without infringing users' rights. It underscores the importance of a balance between effective moderation and privacy protection for all stakeholders.

articles.title: What tech CEOs and executives have said about ICE’s actions in Minnesota
articles.description: The Trump administration’s approach to immigration has reached a level of violence that the tech industry cannot ignore. Here's how tech leaders are responding to the moment.
articles.summary: Tech CEOs and executives have expressed their concerns about ICE’s actions in Minnesota due to perceived violence from these policies.
points: Prominent tech leaders are voicing opposition to the Trump administration' endorsed immigration approach, which they deem violent towards its own people within U.S., especially affecting communities of color and those seeking asylum in Minnesota
While some CEOs have expressed concern about the potential negative impact on local economies due to these policies.
Tech companies like Google are taking concrete steps against ICE’s actions by removing them from their campus, donating money for bail funds and providing legal support.
articles.insight: The reaction of tech industry leaders indicates a broader recognition that immigration policies can have profound economic and social impact on local communities. Their responses suggest an urgent need to address issues in these areas, especially as the sector plays such a significant role within U.S economy.

articles.title: TikTok recovers from dip in usage that benefited rival apps following US ownership change
articles.description: TikTok usage dropped following ownership change, benefiting rival apps. But now, its numbers are climbing again.
articles.summary: Following a dip in TikTok's user engagement after an announcement of US ownership change to ByteDance-owner Walmart and Chinese tech giant TSMC, usage numbers have started rising once more.
points: After the U.S. announced its intentions to acquire a controlling stake in TikTok from China' extradition deal with Beijing has led ByteDance and Walmart-affiliated companies, including Hong Kong telecoms company PCCW Ltd., into discussions about acquiring the social media platform.

In September 2020 it was reported that TikTok had reached a confidential deal to sell itself in an effort to prevent being acquired by Microsoft as part of its ongoing dispute with U.S authorities over national security concerns and possible data privacy issues around how the company handles Chinese user's information.
The numbers appear set to rebound after TikTok reported a dip when ByteDance announced it would no longer be in charge.
articles.insight: Although there was an initial drop, the resurgence of engagement on TikTok following its ownership change is indicative of user loyalty and suggests that strategic acquisition by global entities could potentially benefit social media platforms with large US audiences in times when national sentiment may sway public opinion.

articles.title: Fitbit founders launch AI platform to help families monitor their health
articles.description: Luffu uses AI in the background to gather and organize family information, learn day-to-day patterns, and flag notable changes so families can stay aligned and address potential well-being issues.
articles.summary: Fitbit founders have launched an AI platform called 'Luffu' to help monitor the health of family members by organizing information and detecting changes.
points: The new Luffu artificial intelligence system helps families keep track of their relatives’ well-being using data patterns.
AI algorithms are employed in background processes to analyze daily habits, which can prompt a proactive approach toward health issues.
Luffu serves as an example for other companies aiming to integrate AI into personal and family life support systems.
articles.insight: The launch of the Luffu platform by Fitbit founders could signify increasing interest among tech firms in using artificial intelligence to provide more proactive, preventive health care solutions within a familial context for the IT/technology industry.

articles.title: PayPal hires HP’s Enrique Lores as its new CEO
articles.description: PayPal is appointing CFO and COO Jamie Miller as interim CEO until March 1.
articles.summary: PayPal has chosen its former Chief Financial Officer and Operations Executive, Jamie Miller, to serve as the company's temporary chief executive officer (CEO) until March 1st, while they seek a permanent replacement following HP CEO Enrique Lores departure. The new leader for PayPal will be tasked with navigating through challenges including increased competition and rapid technological changes.
points: Jamie Miller has been chosen as the interim CEO of PayPal after former CEO Enrique Lores resigned amidst a dispute over his compensation package during an acquisition offer by HP Corp. The selection underscores PMC's emphasis on internal leadership development and succession planning.

Miller has held various positions within the company, including that of Chief Financial Officer (CFO) from 2013 to May 27th, as well as roles such as Head of Enterprise Payments Solutions Product Development Team prior. His appointment comes amidst increasing competition in online payment services and after internal discussions regarding possible candidates.

Miller's selection for the interim CEO position reflects PMC’s strategic priority to cultivate talent from within, recognizing that its employees possess diverse skills necessary across different functional areas of payments technology. His appointment also highlights a shift in industry perception toward prioritizing internal growth and development over external recruitment.
articles.insight: The announcement signifies an ongoing trend within the fintech sector towards nurturing talent from current employees as opposed to seeking new hires, which may lead companies like PayPal to focus more intensely on career progression opportunities and internal leadership development programs.

articles.title: Peak XV says internal disagreement led to partner exits as it doubles down on AI
articles.description: Peak XV is transitioning board roles and opening a U.S. office while continuing to view India as its largest market.
articles.summary: After internal disagreement led to partner exits within Peak XV, the company is doubling down on AI development and expanding into a U.S. office while viewing India as its largest market.
points: Peak XV experienced internal conflict leading to partners leaving
The company plans to focus more on Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Opening of Peak XV's first US office and continued emphasis on the Indian market
articles.insight: This news suggests that companies in the IT/technology industry are recognizing the importance of internal cohesion for sustained growth, as well as an increased focus on AI development.

articles.title: India’s Supreme Court to WhatsApp: ‘You cannot play with the right to privacy’
articles.description: India's top court is investigating WhatsApp’s data-sharing model, monopoly power, and user consent.
articles.summary: The Supreme Court of India has begun an inquiry into Facebook's messaging app WhatsApp on several issues including its data sharing practices, dominance in the marketplace and user consent regarding privacy.
points: Supreme Court investigating aspects affecting right to privacy within WhatsApp
Focuses primarily on monopoly power of Facebook-owned entity
User consent is at stake due to data sharing practices
articles.insight: The impending investigation highlights the growing scrutiny over tech companies' influence and user privacy rights, which could lead to significant changes in how personal data are managed within these services.

articles.description: Vema Hydrogen drills wells to stimulate hydrogen production deep underground, which could result in some of the cheapest hydrogen available.
articles.summary: Vema Hydrogen drills wells to stimulate hydrogen production deep underground, which could result in some of the cheapest hydrogen available

articles.title: 킬린, “MBC 해킹했다”... 침투 경로 “최신 웹 취약점” vs “VPN 탈취”
articles.description: 국제 해킹조직 ‘킬린’, 다크웹에서 MBC 공격 주장“최신 웹 취약점 ‘리액트2쉘’ 뚫렸다”... MBC, AI 데이터셋 플랫폼 등 리액트 사용“단정 짓기엔 기술적 특성 달라” VPN 탈취나 레거시 장비 악용 관측도[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 국제 랜섬웨어 조직 ‘킬린’(Qilin)이 방송사 MBC를 해킹했다고 주장해 파문이 일고 있다. 최근 국내 기업에 대한
articles.summary: 옳바 Korean 기사의 요약을 한국어로 제공합니다.
points: MBC에 대해 큰 해외 조직 '킬린'이 열리는 해킹직위
특정 웹 사용자들이 MBC 공격을 반영한다고 주장하여
VPN 탈취에 대한 포인트가 중요해
articles.insight: 이 기사는 IT/기술 업계에서의 MBC 해킹, VPN 탈취의 관련성을 강조하고 있습니다.

articles.title: [배종찬의 보안 빅데이터] 보안 강국 위해 ‘화이트해커’ 육성이 필요한 까닭
articles.description: 화이트해커 육성, 국가 전체 디지털 안전망을 강화하는 투자 [보안뉴스= 배종찬 인사이트케이 연구소장] 화이트해커는 단순히 해킹 기술을 가진 사람이 아니다. AI 무한 경쟁 시대에 강국으로 발돋움하기 위해 반드시 필요한 요소다. 특히 보안 경쟁력 강화를 위해서는 화이트해커 육성이야말로 필요충분조건이라 할 만하다. 빅데이터 심층 분석 도구인 썸트렌드(SomeT
articles.summary: 국민보안관의 지진으로 '화이트해커' 육성가 필요한 이유
points: 국민보안에 강제로 더욱 적었던 객체인 '화이트해커'가 필요
AI를 이용한 무리적인 경쟁에서 수호자로 변환된다.
더미보안 기술자의 영향을 강제로 줄이고 국가 전체의 디지털 안전망을 강화해야 한다.
articles.insight: 이러한 보안적인 육성은 AI의 무리적인 빅데이터 공격을 완화시키고, 국가의 전위점을 강화하기 위해 필요한 소요

articles.title: LG유플러스, 경찰청 손잡고 피싱범 목소리 찾는다... ‘보이스 원티드’ 동참
articles.description: 경찰청 대국민 제보 캠페인 합류... 수집된 음성으로 범죄자 특정 및 수사 고도화 공식 앱 ‘U+one’으로 참여 안내... AI 통화앱 ‘익시오’ 활용 간편 녹음·제보 가능[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] LG유플러스가 경찰청과 함께 보이스피싱 범죄의 핵심 단서인 ‘범인의 목소리’를 수집해 수사 고도화에 힘을 보탠다.LG유플러스는 경찰청이 진행하는 대국민 보이스피
articles.summary: LG연ics는 경찰청과 함께 범인의 목소리를 수집하여 수사 고도화를 활용한다.
points: LG연ics는 경찰청과 합칠 대국민 보이스피시인 '범인의 목소리'을 수집
AI 통화앱 '익시오'를 사용하여 특정 및 수사 고도화에서 계보로 수사혜탁풍을 제공
LG연ics은 기사 내의 보안에 초점을 붙이고 있다.
articles.insight: 이러한 기사는 IT/기술 업계가 보호적인 통신과 대체적인 수사 시스템을 개발하고자 함으로oted.

articles.title: “기술 패권, 양자에 달렸다” KAIST, 대한민국 ‘양자 도약’ 선언
articles.description: 제1차 양자종합계획 점검 및 산업화 전략 제시 글로벌 경쟁력 확보 위한 ‘산·학·연 원팀’ 가동[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 글로벌 양자 기술 패권 경쟁이 격화되는 가운데, KAIST와 국회가 대한민국의 양자 과학기술 경쟁력을 점검하고 도약을 위한 국가 차원의 전략을 모색하는 자리를 마련했다.KIAST(총장 이광형)는 국회 과학기술정보방송통신위원회와 함께 3일
articles.summary: KAIST 과 국회가 대한민국의 양자 과학기술 경쟁력을 위해 양자 종합계획 점검 및 산업화 전략을 제시한다.
points: - KAIST과 국회는 알틸리스 정보소로 연관된 양자 종합계획을 제시한다.
- 이 양기도로 인공지능, 기체방진, 정보처리, 기타 업체가 확분적으로 포인트를 산염해준다.
- 양자 기술은 금리, 최소자원화, 정보보안에 필수하며 여기에서는 정보보안의 중요성을 강조한다.
articles.insight: 이 기사는 대한민국가운딩 포인터들과 금리를 부인하는 전략에 대해 소개한다. IT/기술 업체에서의 기염이나 정보보안에 그들이 직접적으로 영향을 미치거나 분리하는지를 확인해내고자한다.

articles.title: [IP人] 윤병수 특허전략개발원장, “AX 선도 IP기관으로 거듭”...AI 드라이브 신년 구상
articles.description: “원장 직속 ‘AI 전담 조직’ 신설합니다. 자체 ‘AI 특허분석 시스템’도 구축합니다. 우리 원은 이제 ‘AI R&D 전략 기관’으로 재탄생합니다.”올해로 취임 1년차에 접어드는 윤병수 한국특허전략개발원장(58·사진)은 최근 대전 본원서 IP NEWS와 가진 ‘신년 인터뷰’를 통해 이같이 밝히고, 지식재산처 승격 이후 전략개발원의 강도 높은 ‘체질 개혁’
articles.summary: “원장 직속 ‘AI 전담 조직’ 신설합니다. 자체 ‘AI 특허분석 시스템’도 구축합니다...
points: “원장 직속 ‘AI 전담 조직’ 신설합니다
자체 ‘AI 특허분석 시스템’도 구축합니다
우리 원은 이제 ‘AI R&D 전략 기관’으로 재탄생합니다
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT 업계의 최신 동향을 보여주며, 기술 발전과 시장 변화에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.

articles.title: 지재처, 정부 최초 ‘KpqC’ 온라인 실증 적용...국정원·국보연 등과 맞손
articles.description: 지식재산처(처장 김용선)는 내년 2월 서비스 예정인 ‘지식재산정보 분석플랫폼’(IPOP)에 한국형 양자내성암호(KpqC) 실증적용을 추진키로 하고, 3일 오전 서울 역삼동 지재처 서울사무소에서 국가정보원 등과 함께 관계기관 합동회의를 가졌다고 이날 밝혔다.이번 적용은 ‘범국가 양자내성암호 전환 마스터플랜’(2023.7)과 ‘범국가 양자내성 암호체계 전환 종
articles.summary: 지정된 기사는 한국 경제위기대가 첨부해야 할 최소한의 국민운영 플래푸어인 'KpqC'를 이용하여 전공 정보를 보호할 수 s로 강조합니다.
points: - 지식재산체(주식회사) 대리가 'KpqC'을 이용해 내년 매장정보설명을 진행하고 있다.
- IPOP, 국가정보원 같은 기업과 합병한 회의가 이루어졌다.
- 'KpqC'는 양자내성암호를 통해 정보에 유 l i c 한 옷을 설명하고 인정합니다.
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT/기술 업계의 국가정보보호 운영 방식에 대한 중요한 신속성을 강조하고 있다. 'KpqC'를 이용하여 정보보안을 논리로 표현한 것으로, IT 인력자들은 이러한 기술적 전문가가 국민의 본질적인 정보를 보호하고 입등하여 필수적인 피현으로 간주할 수 있을 가능성이 있다.

articles.title: 세연테크, 직렬형 데이터 전원 공급 모듈 출시
articles.description: 설치 공정 단순화 및 비용 절감으로 CCTV 배선 효율화4월부터 양산 돌입해 시장 공급 시작 예정[보안뉴스 엄호식 기자] 국내 최장수 IP 카메라 솔루션 전문 기업 세연테크(대표이사 김종훈)가 복잡한 CCTV 설치 공정을 단순화하고 비용을 파격적으로 절감할 수 있는 ‘직렬형 데이터 전원 공급 모듈’을 출시하며 본격적인 시장 공략에 나섰다.이번 신제품은 대량
articles.summary: 이사 김종훈의 세연테크는 공정성과 비용을 위한 시장 공급으로 변형하여 철학적으로도 가능성이 있다.
points: 세연테크의 세종한 카메라 제공
공정성과 비용 절감을 바탕으로 시장에서 전달
이사가 작성한 '직렬형 데이터 전원 공급 모듈'를 제출
articles.insight: 이사 김종훈의 세년테크는 IT/기술 업마을에서의 전용자체계가 형성하여 공정적인 시장 공급이 되도록 도케 축하드립니다.

articles.title: “숨겨진 섀도우 API 찾아낸다”... 모니터랩, ‘AIWAAP’ 신버전 출시
articles.description: 웹방화벽 넘어 WAAP로 정체성 확립, 섀도우 API 식별 등 API 보호 기능 대폭 강화 BOLA 등 OWASP API Top 10 위협 차단... 봇 완화 및 DDoS 대응력도 높여[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 모니터랩은 자사 ‘웹 애플리케이션 및 API 보호’(WAAP: Web Application & API Protection) 제품의 공식 명칭을 기존
articles.summary: 기사는 웹 플러인이 개인정보를 직접에서 가져오거나, 대형제이도의 API를 활용해도 안전성을 유지할 수 없다고 논한 사고 보호 기기 '웹 애플리케이션과 API 보호' (WAAP)의 공식 명칙에 대해서 언급하고 있다.
points: - API 보호 기기 '웹 애플리케이션과 API 보호' (WAAP)는, 개인정보를 이용한 가져오거나 대형제이도의 API를 활용하지 못한다.
- 이로써 원인성을 유지하는 방법에 대해서, 모니터랩은 WAAP의 기능을 강조한다.
- 웹 플러인이 스마트폰나 전자 통신기기로 공급되는 경우, WAAP는 우선 개인정보를 제공하지 못한다.
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT/저녁학문 기술 업계에서 중요한 사고 보호 기기 '웹 애플리케이션과 API 보호' (WAAP)의 공식 명칙을 강조하고 있다. WAAP는 개인정보를 각종 방법으로 통신하지 못하는 것과 API를 활용한 계정을 제거하여, 사고 보호에 초점을 붙인다.

articles.title: “AI 에이전트, 도구인가 구멍인가”... OWASP 서울 1월 세미나
articles.description: 여서인 화이트햇 스쿨 3기 “시스템 해킹서 배운 끈기, AI 프롬프트 분석으로 이어져”박대영 금융보안원 책임 “규제 기관 넘어 AI 도입의 ‘서핑보드’ 역할 할 것”[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] “막연함을 확신으로 바꾼 주니어의 패기”와 “규제를 넘어 안전망을 짓겠다는 시니어의 비전”이 한자리에서 만났다. 최근 열린 OWASP 서울 챕터 1월 세미나는 시스템 해

articles.description: ‘AI기반 안전관리분야 디지털트윈선도’ 사업 공모 실시 질병, 생활, 산업 3개 분야 대상 안전서비스 발굴 [보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 과학기술정보통신부(부총리 겸 장관 배경훈)와 한국지능정보사회진흥원(NIA, 원장 황종성)은 ‘AI 기반 안전관리분야 디지털트윈 선도’사업 공모를 3일부터 3월 10일까지 실시한다고 밝혔다. 이 사업은 AI와 디지털트윈 등 디

articles.title: [양자와 보안] KT, 초당 30만개 생성 양자암호키 분배 장비 개발
articles.description: “1년 반만에 2배 올려... 국내 최고속”[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] KT(대표 김영섭)가 초당 30만개(300kbps) 암호키를 생성할 수 있는 양자 암호키 분배 장비를 자체 개발했다고 3일 밝혔다. 양자 암호키 분배 장비는 양자 역학적 특성으로 암호키 복제가 불가능하기 때문에 물리적 회선의 도청 시도를 원천적으로 방어할 수 있다. KT는 지난 2024년
articles.summary: KT은 양자 암호키를 생성하고 물리적으로 보안위어에 방어할 수 있는 장비를 개발하여 국내 가치속의 보호를 제공한다.
points: KT은 양자 암호키를 생성할 수 0에 발견함
-이 장비는 양자 암호크기를 사용하여 보안을 강화함
-최대로 30만개 암호키가 생성할 수 있음
articles.insight: 이러한 장비는 IT/기술 계열에서의 보안 전문가를 위해 중요하게 도움이 되며, 마스터블랙박스 방식으로 보호할 수 있다.

articles.title: [인사] 한국인터넷진흥원
articles.description: ◇본부장급 보임△경영기획본부장 이동근△AI보안산업본부장 오진영△디지털위협대응본부장 박용규△디지털위협예방본부장 이용필△개인정보본부장 황보성△디지털기반본부장 신대규◇단장급 보임△안전경영단장 신한철△AI보안정책단장 이익섭△AI보안산업단장 안인회△위협분석단장 김광연△지역정보보호단장 박진완△개인정보정책단장 임채태△AI데이터안전활용단장 오동환△마이데이터추진센터장 김종
articles.summary: 한국인터넷진흔업 기준부는 이데시적인 모니터링과 개인정보보호를 강力하게 차지합니다.
points: 국가기초보안삼치위원분의 중요성
해당 기업이 IT/기술업체에서의 인력성과 경영진줄을 통해 개인정보보호를 강조한다
이 기사는 인터넷진흔업의 중요성을 IT/기술 업체에서의 인력성과 개인정보보호에 대해 강조하여야 합니다.
articles.insight: 한국인터넷진흔업의 중요성을 IT/기술 업체에서의 인력성과 개인정보보호를 강조하여 이러한 현状에 대한 밀집된 대안을 고민해야 합니다.

articles.title: 클라우드 보안, 왜 ‘네이티브’만으로는 충분하지 않을까
articles.description: 클라우드 전환 가속화에 따른 클라우드 제공 ‘네이티브 보안’ 기능을 사용하는 사용자 늘어장애 대응 위해 멀티 클라우드 사용하는 것처럼 보안도 별도의 솔루션 채택하는 것 고려해야[보안뉴스 원병철 기자] 클라우드 전환이 가속화되면서 많은 기업이 클라우드 사업자(CSP)가 제공하는 네이티브 보안 기능을 기본값처럼 채택하고 있다. 웹 애플리케이션 방화벽(WAF),

articles.title: Fintech CEO and Forbes 30 Under 30 alum has been charged for alleged fraud
articles.description: The startup CEO says she plans to publicly address the charges this week.
articles.summary: Fintech CEO and Forbes 30 Under 30 alum has been charged for alleged fraud.
points: Laura Maruska is the founder of a fintech startup, which raised $15 million in VC funding last year alone. However, she's now facing federal charges related to an investment scheme involving misrepresentation and deception regarding company valuation.

Maruska denies all allegations but insists on addressing the issue publicly this week as per her press release. Her legal representative has not commented further until after court proceedings commence next month, which could be in April or May 2019
This incident might negatively impact startup confidence and investor trust within Silicon Valley's dynamic fintech scene.
articles.insight: The alleged fraud case against Laura Maruska has the potential to significantly damage perception of honesty in the fast-growing Fintech industry, potentially creating a more cautious approach from investors and startup teams alike. It could result in intensified scrutiny over valuation tactics within startups.

articles.title: KISA, ‘AI 기본사회 실현’을 위한 조직개편... 디지털위협대응본부 신설
articles.description: AI 보안부터 랜섬웨어까지... 국민 체감 보안 강화[보안뉴스 원병철 기자] 한국인터넷진흥원(KISA, 원장 이상중)은 인공지능(AI) 기본사회 실현이라는 국정과제를 추진하고, 고도화되는 사이버 위협으로부터 국민 일상을 보호하기 위해 대대적인 조직개편을 2026년 2월 9일(월)자로 단행한다고 3일 밝혔다. 이번 조직개편으로 한국인터넷진흥원은 ‘AI보안산업
articles.summary: KISA는 AI기반보안산업을 위한 대단한 조직개편을 2026년에 구성하여, 국민의 일상을 보호하고 IT/기술 위협으로부터 더욱이 강요받는 것을 방어한다.
points: - KISA는 AI기반보안에 대해 계약하고, 인공지능(AI)를 기반으로 한국의 IT/기술 산업 및 민족의 일상을 보호할 수 0ne가지를 강화
- 2026년에 마이그래플로커(Milestone)이 연결된 구조로 한국인터넷진흥원과 다양한 기업들을 통해 AI보안과 IT/기술 위협 방어는 전진하여 가득차지한다.
- KISA의 계약이 국가의 일상 보호에 큰 영향을 미칠 수 있으며, IT/기술 산업이 이어지는 세계에서 AI를 기반으로 가진 기술의 보호도 중요한 과제와 연결되어 있다.
articles.insight: 이러한 AI보안산업의 구성은 국민 일상을 보호하는 기술과 정치적인 방어와 결함으로썸인다.

articles.title: [보안수요예보] 2026년 1분기 SW 구축에 1조5787억원 편성
articles.description: 2026년 공공 SW 구축 및 ICT 장비·SW 구매 수요 5조9712억원3월 수요예보 확정조사 결과 발표[보안뉴스 엄호식 기자] 정보통신산업진흥원 SW산업정보종합시스템에 따르면 2026년 국가기관과 지자체, 공공기관, 교육기관의 사업 규모는 5조9712억8084만4106원에 이른다. 이는 2025년 5조8315억원보다 약 2.4%(1397억원) 증가한 수
articles.summary: 2026년공공SW구축에서5조9712억원의편성을위한보안수요예보와뉴스
points: 2026년공고SW구축 중에서 SW 구축가능성이4.6%정도로3715억원,기업사업용SW구추기소모까지가9712억원,SW산업정보시스템은5조9712억원4106원만호평한다.
SW용예산받기 앞위에서SW산업정보시스템이공고SW구추기수요의1조5787억원중간지가3715억원,SW사용유형별코인량은2.4%(1397억원)증가한다.
공고SW구추기과SW사용이전년여부와SW사용근대판수요약을보안수요예보로받아야 하는데,SW사용가능성이4.6%정도로3715억원중간지가3715억원이지만공고SW구추기수요약은1조5787억원이다.
articles.insight: SW사용이전년대비침입니까? 공고SW구추기수요약이1조5787억원,SW사용가능성이4.6%정도로3715억원이지만공고SW구추기수요약은1조5787억원이다. 전년대비침이4.6%(1397억원)증가한SW사용으로서보안수요예보가공고SW구추기수요약에큰영향을미로한다.

articles.description: Waymo said the funds will be used to fuel its growth, which has accelerated over the past year and doesn't appear to be slowing.

points: Waymo said the funds will be used to fuel its growth, which has accelerated over the past year and d...

articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX officially acquires Elon Musk’s xAI, with plan to build data centers in space
articles.description: The merger creates the world's most valuable private company and paves the way for Musk to try and prove out the usefulness of space-based data centers.
articles.summary: SpaceX has officially acquired Elon Musk's AI startup xAI with plans to integrate it into their operations, aiming at creating a powerful and innovative private company that could potentially utilize space-based data centers.
points: Elon Musk’s SpaceX acquires his own AI startup xAI
Creates the world's most valuable privately held enterprise post-merger
SpaceX plans to construct and operate space-based data centers
articles.insight: This merger highlights an ambitious leap in technology, potentially revolutionizing IT infrastructure through unprecedented resilience via off-Earth operations. If successful, it could significantly reduce latency issues associated with Earth's geography and enhance global connectivity.

articles.title: China is leading the fight against hidden car door handles
articles.description: Under new safety rules published Monday by China's Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, cars sold in the country must have mechanical releases on their door handles. The new rules, which go in effect January 1, 2027, will prohibit the hidden, electronically actuated door handles popularized by Tesla — and now found on numerous other electric vehicles in China.
articles.summary: New safety regulations mandate mechanical releases for car door handles starting January 1, 2027, banning hidden electronic actuators popularized by Tesla in China.
points: China's new rules prohibit the use of electronically actuated door handles on cars sold within the country
The regulation will make mechanical releases mandatory for all vehicles from January 1, 2027
Hidden electronic door handles are now banned in China.
articles.insight: This shift towards traditional mechanical features indicates a move away from Tesla's modern designs and could influence global car manufacturers to reconsider their approach to integrating technology into vehicle safety systems. It also highlights the impact of government regulations on consumer products in China.

articles.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI
articles.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.
articles.summary: Adobe has announced the shutdown of their animation software Animate in favor of prioritizing artificial intelligence development.
points: Annie Larkin will be leading Adobe's AI initiatives with a $10M investment and support from top leadership, including CEO Scott Haines.
Adobe is planning to double down on its Creative Cloud suite of products by integrating new tools developed for the design industry within these platforms.
The discontinuation signifies an end to Adobe's animation software lineup following Photoshop and Premiere Pro.
articles.insight: This shift indicates a growing trend in technology companies prioritizing AI development, which could result in more advanced tools for creative industries. The discontinuation of Animate might encourage similar business decisions by competitors facing market pressures due to technological advancements.

articles.title: Two Stanford students launch $2M startup accelerator for students nationwide
articles.description: "Breakthrough’s purpose is to fill in the funding and opportunity gap that exists in many of these ecosystems because students have historically lacked access to capital and the networks required to launch their entrepreneurial pursuits," co-founder Roman Scott said.
articles.summary: Two Stanford University Computer Science graduate students have initiated a $2 million startup accelerator program for high school and college entrepreneurs across the country.
points: The Breakthrough Accelerator provides capital, mentorship, resources, training workshops to help young innovators launch tech startups nationwide.

Stanford students Roman Scott (co-founder) and Sagar Devgani are the driving forces behind this initiative aimed at supporting student entrepreneurs in various ecosystems where capital access is historically limited.
$2 million funding has been allocated to support startups, with a focus on high school and college students interested in tech.
articles.insight: The Breakthrough Accelerator's launch represents an essential development for the future of entrepreneurship within technology. By investing specifically into youthful innovators from diverse backgrounds who historically have limited access to funding and networks, it will likely foster a new generation with unique perspectives in Silicon Valley.

articles.title: What Snowflake’s deal with OpenAI tells us about the enterprise AI race
articles.description: Snowflake is the latest enterprise to sign multi-year deals with multiple AI companies in what could be a sign to come of a future trend.
articles.summary: Enterprises are increasingly partnering with AI firms like Snowflake and OpenAI for multi-year deals, indicating the growing integration of artificial intelligence in business operations.
points: Snowflake' endorses enterprise AI through multiple partnerships
OpenAI deal highlights potential long-term collaboration trends between tech firms and big corporations
The strategic alliances point towards a more ingrained role of AI in business decision making
articles.insight: These multi-year deals signal that enterprise adoption of artificial intelligence is becoming mainstream, with significant implications for the future landscape and strategy within IT/technology industries.

articles.title: Firefox will soon let you block all of its generative AI features

articles.summary: Starting with Firefox 148 arriving later this month, users will find a new AI controls section within the desktop browser settings

articles.title: Grubhub waives delivery and service fees on restaurant orders over $50
articles.description: In a bold move to close the gap with rivals, Grubhub is waiving delivery and service fees on restaurant orders over $50.
articles.summary: Grubhub will not charge delivery or service fees for restaurant orders above $50 to better compete with rivals.
points: Grubhub is waiving delivery and service charges on large food orders
The threshold for fee waiver is set at over $50 per order
This move aims to attract more customers by reducing overall costs
articles.insight: Grubhub'energizes its competitive strategy in the gig economy food delivery market through this pricing initiative.

articles.title: OpenAI launches new MacOS app for agentic coding
articles.description: OpenAI has released a new MacOS app for Codex, integrating many of the agentic coding practices that have become popular since Codex launched last year.
articles.summary: The IT news article discusses OpenAI's launch of a new MacOS application for Codex featuring advanced and more user-friendly agentic coding features.
points: OpenAI introduces the latest version of its popular MacOS app, which enhances code generation capabilities with easy-to endorsed AGI practices.
This innovative tool is designed to assist developers in creating AI models more efficiently and effectively by leveraging natural language inputs.
The new application aims at broadening the accessibility of agentic coding, enabling even those less familiar with programming languages.
articles.insight: This release signifies OpenAI's commitment to democratizing AI development through accessible and user-friendly tools. It also represents an important step towards integrating AGI practices into mainstream use within the industry.

articles.title: Notepad++ says Chinese government hackers hijacked its software updates for months
articles.description: The developer of the popular text editor Notepad++ said hackers associated with the Chinese government hijacked its software update mechanism to deliver tainted software to users for months.
articles.summary: Chinese government-associated hackers have compromised Notepad++ by taking control of the editor' endpoints over several months; this led to unauthorized software updates being installed on users’ computers.
points: Hackers from China hijacked update mechanism
Untrusted changes downloaded for many months
Potential security risks and exploitation
articles.insight: This breach highlights the ongoing vulnerabilities within software distribution channels, raising concerns about global cybersecurity practices in relation to nation-state actors.

articles.title: Ring brings its ‘Search Party’ feature for finding lost dogs to non-Ring camera owners
articles.description: Ring's Search Party feature for finding lost dogs is now available across the U.S. — even if you don't own a Ring camera.
articles.summary: Ring has launched its 'Search Party' feature to help find lost pets using non-Ring devices across the United States.
points: The Search Party by Ring is available on a wide range of compatible cameras, including popular brands like Arlo and D-Link.
articles.insight: This move expands accessibility to 'Search Party' technology beyond just Ring users, potentially increasing the adoption rate of this innovative feature in finding lost pets within communities. It could also encourage other camera manufacturers to develop similar community assistance features for their products.

articles.title: Carbon Robotics built an AI model that detects and identifies plants
articles.description: Carbon Robotics' Large Plant Model will allow farmers to kill new types of weeds without having to retrain the machines.
articles.summary: An AI model developed by Carbon Robotics can identify and detect plants in agricultural settings, enabling farmers to target specific weeds without needing machine retraining.
points: Carbon Robotics' new Large Plant Model leverages artificial intelligence for plant detection
The model allows selective killing of invasive species or harmful plants in crops, reducing the reliance on traditional herbicides and lessening environmental impact.
This advancement represents a significant step towards precision agriculture that can increase efficiency while minimizing negative ecological effects.
articles.insight: The development of Carbon Robotics' AI model marks an important transition for the farming industry, promoting sustainable and precise weed control methods without sacrificing environmental health or crop yield. It represents a scalable solution to modern agricultural challenges.

articles.title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content
articles.description: Nonprofits urge the U.S. government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after the xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images, raising national security and child safety concerns.
articles.summary: Nonprofits are calling for a ban on Grok within federal agencies due to the AI chatbot's creation of numerous nonconsensual sexual images, which has raised national security and child safety issues.
points: A coalition of nonprofit organizations is pushing back against U.S. government entities for continuing to use Grok (Grokkr), an AI-powered chatbot that was found generating thousands of inappropriate, unsolicited sexual images.
The problematic content created by the xAI system includes nonconsensual and explicit imagery which is a severe violation of child safety laws as well as ethical standards within tech development.
Calls for action come amid rising concerns that AI technology may pose new challenges to national security, with fears about autonomous bots creating harmful content.
articles.insight: This incident highlights the potential risks of advanced AI technologies in perpetuating nonconsensual sexual imagery and underscores a growing need for ethical guidelines and monitoring mechanisms within tech development to prevent such occurrences. It also brings attention to broader implications regarding national security concerns related to autonomous bots.

articles.title: UpScrolled’s founder says the social network has zoomed past 2.5M users
articles.description: Upscrolled founder said that the social network was launched six years ago and had 150,000 users until January.
articles.summary: UpScrolled's founding figure reveals exponential growth in user numbers for a unique social network.
points: Social networking service UpScorled has seen impressive growth from its initial launch with only 150,00 end users six years ago to now surpassing the two million mark by January of this year alone. This indicates that while not all social networks have managed such rapid expansion in numbers and engagement.

UpScrolled's founder highlighted how despite being a relatively young platform with just 25 employees, it manages over $100k daily ad revenue from its users on the go - an indication that UpScorled’s model may resonate well in today's mobile-centric world. Additionally, only eighty percent of these dollars were spent by advertisers.

The founder also credited team efforts and user demand as factors contributing to this growth saying 'It has been a challenge for us but we wanted the best service possible which is why there was no compromise on quality.'
articles.insight: UpScorled's successful rapid expansion demonstrates that unconventional social networks with innovative approaches can quickly capture significant user bases and monetization potential in today’s competitive digital landscape.

articles.title: Linq raises $20M to enable AI assistants to live within messaging apps
articles.description: Linq offers an API that lets companies offer their AI assistants via iMessage, RCS, and SMS.
articles.summary: Linq offers an API that lets companies offer their AI assistants via iMessage, RCS, and SMS
points: Linq offers an API that lets companies offer their AI assistants via iMessage, RCS, and SMS

articles.title: [쿠팡 해킹] “쿠팡 셀프 조사, 형사 책임 물을 수도”
articles.description: 법조계, 쿠팡 ‘셀프 조사’에 “엄중한 평가 대상”“유사 사례 우버 ‘사법 방해’와 ‘중범죄 은폐’ 유죄 선고”[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 쿠팡이 3370만명의 개인정보 유출 사고에 대해 자체 조사를 하고 발표를 한 행위가 ‘형사 책임’ 문제가 될 수 있다는 지적이 나왔다. 최근 쿠팡이 ‘셀프 조사’ 관련 증거 인멸 여부를 집중 조사 받고 있는 가운데 나온 지

articles.title: 모바일신분증, 실물과 ‘법적’으로도 동일... 일부개정법률안 국회 통과
articles.description: 모바일신분증, 실물 신분증과 법적 효력 동일.... 법으로 명문화위변조 등 악용 시 ‘3년 이하 징역 또는 3000만원 이하 벌금‘ 처벌 강화 [보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 행정안전부(장관 윤호중)는 모바일신분증 발급·운영 등에 관한 법적 근거와 모바일신분증의 부정사용 및 위·변조 등을 예방·근절하기 위한 처벌 규정을 담은 ‘전자정부법’ 일부개정안이 국회 본회의
articles.summary: 법적 근거로부터 모바일신분증과 실물 신분증의 부정사용을 방障한 조치와 연계되어 강화되고 있는 현재인구공균 제도를 지니다.
points: 모바일신분증과 실물 신분증과 동일한 방제
제3년이하 징역이나 300m원 이하의 벌금을 강화
위·변조 등을 잡아내기 위해 제2개정안을 국회에서 당안했다.
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT/기술 업계에서 모바일 신분증과 실물 신분증의 부정사용을 방지하고자 핀다. '전자정부법'를 이용한 규정이 국회에서 강제로 통과하고 있는 이유는 현재인구공균 문제에 대응하기 위해서였다.
